name: cheekiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that is slightly rude or or shows a lack of respect, but may be funny: There was no trace of his usual cheekiness. Alongside the seriousness she has a great sense of fun and cheekiness. See
cheeky
More examplesFewer examplesThe band has a cheekiness that makes it hard not to like.He’s quick-witted and adventurous, with maybe just a hint of cheekiness.I love the photos of her family, captured in moments of joy and cheekiness.She talked of presenting opera and ballet with as much cheekiness and sass as possible.He employed an inventive cheekiness working on election campaigns in his youth.
